participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is introspective and enjoys spending her free time pursuing creative outlets like dancing. She is practical and somewhat indifferent to trends, focusing instead on her passions.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i don't care about fashion.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is friendly and sociable, with a laid-back attitude. He enjoys sports and is motivated to find a job that fits his interests.
participant_2.background: i have one older sister. my favourite artist is travis scott. i'm currently looking for a job preferably at a restaurant. my mother is a dentist. i like playing basketball.

content.text: i studied chemistry in school   and yes girls were mean
